title: Week In Politics: From ISIS To Election Spoilers
teaser: President Obama said the U.S. misjudged ISIS's rise, and House Speaker John Boehner says to destroy ISIS, the U.S. would need "boots on the ground."
contentencoded:
In this week’s political preview, we look at comments by President Obama during a “60 Minutes” interview that the U.S. underestimated ISIS.

Meantime on ABC News, House Speaker John Boehner said that to destroy ISIS, the U.S. would need to put American “boots on the ground.”

NPR’s Charlie Mahtesian talks to Here & Now‘s Robin Young about this week in politics.

Guest

  • Charlie Mahtesian, digital politics editor for NPR. He tweets @charlieNPR
Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
